amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 116-2 to extend eligibility to Army Corps of Engineers and FEMA projects, but ensure they do not receive funding in excess of the amount at which they are authorized.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Graves (LA).
